method.name: i_cal_property_new

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The kind of #ICalProperty to be created

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalProperty with the type @kind.

method.comment: Creates a #ICalProperty of the target type.

method.name: i_cal_property_clone

returns.comment: The newly created #ICalProperty deeply cloned from @prop.

method.comment: Deeply clone a #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_new_from_string

parameter.name: str
parameter.comment: The string used to construct a #ICalProperty

method.comment: Creates a #ICalProperty from a string.

method.name: i_cal_property_as_ical_string
method.comment: Converts a #ICalProperty to a string representation.

method.name: i_cal_property_free
method.comment: Frees a #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_isa

parameter.name: property
parameter.comment: The #ICalProperty which type is to be determined

method.comment: Gets the kind of #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_isa_property

parameter.name: property
parameter.comment: The object whose native part to be checked

returns.comment: 1 if the native part of @property is of the type icalproperty, 0 if not.

method.comment: Checks whether the native part of #ICalProperty is of the type icalproperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_add_parameter

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The parameter to be added into @prop

method.comment: Adds a #ICalParameter into the #ICalProperty. It behaves like set the copy of the #ICalParameter. Upon completion the native part of #ICalParameter will be set to NULL.

method.name: i_cal_property_take_parameter

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The parameter to be added into @prop

method.comment: Adds the @parameter into the @prop and free the @parameter.

method.name: i_cal_property_set_parameter

parameter.name: parameter
parameter.comment: The parameter to be set into @prop

method.comment: Sets a #ICalParameter into the #ICalProperty. It behaves like set the copy of the #ICalParameter. Upon completion the native part of #ICalParameter will be set to NULL.

method.name: i_cal_property_set_parameter_from_string
method.comment: Sets the #ICalProperty with the parameter defined by the name and value.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_parameter_as_string

parameter.name: name
parameter.comment: The name of the target parameter

returns.comment: The string representation of the parameter.

method.comment: Gets the string representation of the target parameter in the #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_remove_parameter_by_kind
method.comment: Removes the target kind of the parameters in the #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_remove_parameter_by_name

parameter.name: name
parameter.comment: The name of the parameter to be removed

method.comment: Removes parameter in the #ICalProperty by name.

method.name: i_cal_property_remove_parameter_by_ref
method.comment: Removes the parameter in the #ICalProperty by ref.

method.name: i_cal_property_count_parameters

returns.comment: The count of the parameters in the #ICalProperty.

method.comment: Counts the parameters in the #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_first_parameter

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The target kind of #ICalParameter to be retrieved

method.comment: Gets the first #ICalParameter from the parent #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_next_parameter

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The target kind of #ICalParameter to be retrieved

method.comment: Gets the next #ICalParameter from the parent #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_set_value

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The #ICalValue will be set as the property of @prop

method.comment: Sets the #ICalProperty with the #ICalValue.

method.name: i_cal_property_take_value

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The #ICalValue will be set as the property of @prop

method.comment: Sets the @prop with the @value and unrefs the @value.

method.name: i_cal_property_set_value_from_string

parameter.name: value
parameter.comment: The value used to construct the #ICalValue

parameter.name: kind
parameter.comment: The kind used to construct the #ICalValue

method.comment: Sets the #ICalProperty with the #ICalValue constructed from string.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_value
method.comment: Gets the #ICalValue of #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_value_as_string

returns.comment: The string representation of the value of the #ICalProperty.

method.comment: Gets the string representation of the value in #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_value_set_parent
method.comment: Sets the parent property of a value.

method.name: i_cal_value_get_parent
method.comment: Gets the parent #ICalProperty of the specified #ICalValue.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_set_parent
method.comment: Sets the parent #ICalProperty of an #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_get_parent
method.comment: Gets the parent #ICalProperty of the specified #ICalParameter.

method.name: i_cal_property_set_x_name
method.comment: Sets the name of x property for the #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_x_name
method.comment: Gets the name of x property.

method.name: i_cal_property_get_property_name
method.comment: Gets the property name of #ICalProperty.

method.name: i_cal_parameter_value_to_value_kind
method.comment: Converts the #ICalParameterValue to #ICalValueKind.

method.name: i_cal_property_kind_to_value_kind
method.comment: Converts the #ICalPropertyKind to #ICalValueKind.

method.name: i_cal_value_kind_to_property_kind
method.comment: Converts a #ICalValueKind to a #ICalPropertyKind.

method.name: i_cal_property_kind_to_string
method.comment: Converts the #ICalPropertyKind to a string.

method.name: i_cal_property_kind_from_string
method.comment: Converts the string to #ICalPropertyKind.

method.name: i_cal_property_kind_is_valid
method.comment: Checks whether #ICalPropertyKind is valid.

method.name: i_cal_property_method_from_string
method.comment: Converts the string to #ICalPropertyKind.

method.name: i_cal_property_method_to_string
method.comment: Converts the #ICalPropertyMethod to string.

method.name: i_cal_property_enum_to_string
method.comment: Converts the enum to string.

method.name: i_cal_property_kind_and_string_to_enum
method.comment: Converts a integer and string into an enum.

method.name: i_cal_property_status_from_string
method.comment: Converts the string to #ICalPropertyKind.

method.name: i_cal_property_status_to_string
method.comment: Converts the #ICalPropertyStatus to string.

method.name: i_cal_property_kind_has_property
method.comment: Checks whether the enum belongs to the #ICalPropertyKind.
